daily_plan_req: Klaus Mueller goes to the library at Oak Hill College at 9:10 AM, spends his days coding and debug, and sometimes communicates at Hobbs Cafe.

learned: Klaus Mueller is a student at Oak Hill College studying software engineering. He is passionate about coding and loves to explore new things.
